channel.title: equinox on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in equinox on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 3.6: Five Months
item.description: 8th April 2013 Hi! Yes, it’s been a long time. Nearly 5 months since I last wrote an update email. In November I went to Berlin for my UK visa, and spent whatever hours I was not at work or sleeping on writing a novel.

item.title: LOG 1.13: Spring 'time', German and the 60Â´s
item.description: 31st March, 2011 After some rain last night, the air smells like monsoon in India; so fresh and clean! IÂ´ve opened the window to let it come in and along with it are the chirps and tweets of the birds.

item.title: LOG 1.12: DMT, The Discovery of Dro"gen Hasen Weg and the Super Extreme Moon
item.description: 18th March, 2011 Hello everyone, I watched this video recently. http://www.esoterictube.com/dmt-the-spirit-molecule.html It corresponds with what Joseph Campbell says about the spiritual world (as represented by myths and anecdotes from those who meditate, and shamans), drugs and psychological diseases like schizophrenia.

item.title: LOG 1.11: Light jackets and Programing
item.description: 13th March, 2011 Hi Everyone ðŸ™‚ We are halfway through March and temperatures are now ranging between 7-13! Quite warm (relatively) and it is now ok to venture out with either a light jacket with a heavy-ish sweater or with only one heavy jacket on.

item.title: LfE 23: Spring in full swing
item.description: 05/04/2010 Hello everyone, We passed the Equinox on the 21st of March. We celebrated and welcomed spring in full swing. Daffodils now grow where the White and purple flowers did.
